title: Crypto Industry Secures Early Victory in Legal Battle With Regulators
description: A judge ruled that the sale of the cryptocurrency XRP on public exchanges did not violate securities law.

title: FTC Chair Lina Khan Faces Criticism in Congressional Hearing
description: Lina Khan faced more than three hours of questioning from the Republican-led House Judiciary Committee.

title: Texas TikTok Ban Challenged for Threatening ‘Academic Freedom’
description: A lawsuit filed on Thursday says that Gov. Greg Abbott’s ban is compromising research and teaching at public universities.

title: Founder of Bankrupt Crypto Firm Celsius Arrested on Fraud Charges
description: Alex Mashinsky was arrested at his home in New York on Thursday morning. He and his former firm also face lawsuits from the Securities and Exchange Commission and other regulators.

title: F.T.C. Is Investigating ChatGPT Maker
description: The agency sent OpenAI, which makes ChatGPT, a letter this week over the chatbot’s potential harms and the company’s security practices.
